title.value: Leveraging ChatGPT to Democratize and Decolonize Global Surgery: Large Language Models for Small Healthcare Budgets
title.justification: Extracted from the title of the paper.
title.quote: Leveraging ChatGPT to Democratize and Decolonize Global Surgery: Large Language Models for Small Healthcare Budgets

extractions.description: The paper discusses the potential of large language models, specifically ChatGPT, to democratize and decolonize global surgery by making surgical knowledge more accessible, fostering clinical decision support systems, and supporting surgical education and research in low- and middle-income countries (LMICs).

type.justification: The paper discusses theoretical applications and implications of using ChatGPT in different aspects of surgical care.
type.quote: We discuss several ways in which this could be achieved in clinical, educational, and research contexts.

name.justification: The paper focuses on the potential applications of AI, particularly ChatGPT, in medical and surgical contexts.
name.quote: While burgeoning literature continues to ask, ‘‘What can ChatGPT do for us?’’, little has been written about this revolutionary technology’s potential in advancing global surgery equity by democratizing and decolonizing surgical care.

name.justification: The paper discusses the use of ChatGPT in enhancing clinical decision-making and providing diagnostic and therapy planning support.
name.quote: ChatGPT can foster clinical decision support systems encompassing knowledge-based support, diagnostics, and therapy planning.

name.justification: The paper highlights applications of ChatGPT in generating educational resources for surgical training.
name.quote: Chatbots can generate numerous high-quality multiple-choice and short-answer questions as well as detailed, referenced, model answers, and even clinical examination stations with complete standardized patient instructions and scoring schemes.

name.justification: The paper discusses how ChatGPT can assist in various stages of the research process for surgical investigators.
name.quote: Chatbots like ChatGPT can assist throughout the research process, from project ideation to manuscript fine-tuning and correction.

name.justification: The paper extensively discusses the applications of ChatGPT in various medical and surgical contexts.
name.quote: The dramatic advancement in generative AI, typified by the use of large language models for chatbots like ChatGPT...

is_contributed.justification: ChatGPT was referenced in the paper but is not a contribution of this particular research.
